Class FSM_API.Internal.FsmBucket

Represents an internal container for an FSM definition and all its active instances.

Namespace: TheSingularityWorkshop.FSM_API
Assembly: FSM_API.dll
Syntax
public class FSM_API.Internal.FsmBucket
Remarks

This class is used internally by the FSM_API to efficiently manage FSM definitions and their associated running instances within specific processing groups. It tracks the FSM's blueprint, its live instances, and properties related to its update rate. Being public (nested within an internal class), it's effectively encapsulated within the FSM_API's internal structure.

| Edit this page View Source

Instances

A list of all active FSMHandle instances created from this definition.

Declaration
public List<FSMHandle> Instances
Field Value
Type Description
List<FSMHandle>
Remarks

Instances are added to this list upon creation and removed upon unregistration or automatic removal due to error thresholds. The list itself is never null.

| Edit this page View Source

ProcessRate

The desired processing rate for instances of this FSM definition.

Declaration
public int ProcessRate
Field Value
Type Description
int

-1: Process every frame (or every call to Update(string)). 0: Event-driven only (will not be processed by Update(string)'s internal tick). >0: Process every Nth frame, where N is the value of ProcessRate.
